```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(mosaic)
data(mtcars)
coefs <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars) %>%
  coef() %>%
  round()
```

Question
========

Mit dem Ergebnis:

$$\widehat{\text{mpg}} = `r coefs[1]`  `r coefs[2]` \cdot \text{wt}$$
Bei 

$$\text{wt}=4$$
Wie lautet ihre Prognose f√ºr $\widehat{\text{mpg}}$?



Solution
========

$$\widehat{\text{mpg}} = `r coefs[1]` + `r coefs[2]` \cdot 4 = `r coefs[1]+coefs[2]*4`$$
